website_summaries.verdict: Using ultraviolet light, this portable unit eliminates 99.99 percent of viruses and bacteria in 6 minutes.
pros: UV light eliminates 99.99% of E. coli and other viruses and bacteria in 6 minutes
Can also use with bottle nipples
Internal pacifier clips can be removed, allowing for larger sized pacifiers
cons: Can only sterilize one item at a time

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to sterilize menstrual cups!
customer_reviews.text: Use it to sterilize my Lena menstrual cup, and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: runningonprime

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: I use my UV phone sanitizers (at home and at work) to sanitize my phone, keys, debit card, and work ID. While looking for another UV phone sanitizer as a gift, I came across this unit. It is portable and convenient to sanitize my keys. It will also be useful for other small items such as headphones. It runs on three AAA batteries, which are not included. Comforting in this new normal. Please note - this is too small to sanitize a face mask.
customer_reviews.author: QuietLady

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell, plus the smell
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell if it works, nothing looks too different which is not the biggest deal, but the smell it leaves after is NOT great. sort of metallic smell from the UV light probably because it so small in there, the pacifier is really packed in there.
customer_reviews.author: Tippy

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my menstrual cups. I have to stuff the cups in there, but it works. Wish it was just a tiny bit bigger, but it's great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix87

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and so Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sterilize feeding nipples for kittens and it's perfect. I guess I can't say for sure that it actually sterilizes the nipples but with the Cuisinart name I feel comfortable believing that it does. A little added peace of mind when feeding newborns.
customer_reviews.author: Midge

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is easy to throw in my diaper bag and use quickly when out and around town. At home, I leave it on my mantle and get to use it a couple times a day. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Noel E.

customer_reviews.title: We love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to put in her diaper bag. It never fails the pacifier will fall or touch something gross when away from home. We love the sanitizer for the quick extra peace of mind. It has performed well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: This sterilizer is really small. That said, it's easy to use, and takes up little space. It's great for one or maybe two nipples or pacifiers. The technology is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: I wish these were available when my kids were babies
customer_reviews.text: My daughter introduced me to this product when my newest grandchild was born. It is very easy to use; it runs on battery power and only takes about 6 minutes of time for sanitizing. I like knowing that my grandchild's pacifier is clean and germ free and it can be cleaned quickly if it's accidentally dropped on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Packerfan15

customer_reviews.title: Devours AAA batteries
customer_reviews.text: I use this to disinfect any item that will fit. Definitely smell ozone, don't breathe it. Going through a set of batteries weekly, using it maybe a dozen times a day or more. No option for power supply. USB power would have been nice. Going to need to get rechargeable batteries or return this.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great item to keep a virus away
customer_reviews.text: Amazing item!! Was worried about the germs especially firing covid. This makes feel like my baby is getting the best care by sanitizing his pacifiers. It dies leave a smell but I’m assuming it’s the smell of being cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The one I ordered was defective, did not work with any type of battery. Can't give a full review on it since it never worked but I don't recommend buying it, at least from this retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: An early Father’s Day gift for my significant other. He loves gadgets and immediately started reading the manual for this device. It is small and portable. You can place a clean pacifier inside during adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Temporary a.

customer_reviews.title: not bad, but have some problem
customer_reviews.text: The power is very low as if the effect of sterilization is not particularly significant. Can smell the smell of ozone. Once the nipple got stuck in it, it took a long time to take it out.
customer_reviews.author: rayking

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I put my invisalign trays in here after cleaning them. I definitely think it does what it claims.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: Decent orduct
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work fine however it does leave a smell on pacifiers that transfers to your baby mouth . I’m not too found of that but I’m sure it comes from the UV light
customer_reviews.author: Yasmeen

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, very satisfied here especially during the pandemic. Might be useful for cash bills, keys, earphones, etc. Too small for a card or anything that size/larger
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Good product but I received a defective ones
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to live this product but unfortunately It didn’t work for me. I ordered the first one I love it then it topped working and I got a replacement then the replacement didn’t even work at all from the a minute I received. May be it’s my luck that I had received 2 defective products I don’t know
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go baby
customer_reviews.text: For babies on the go that drop their pacifier. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lyons

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I actually used it for my keys as well as my AirPods.
customer_reviews.author: Azzie

customer_reviews.title: Good gift.
customer_reviews.text: Gave the product as a gift. Heard the item is hot 🔥 if removed immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetayloves2 buy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must while traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Great for on the go. Wife loves it. Small and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Waqas Khan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product but Recommendation is not necessary to use it only once. :(
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Barely fits a baby, but it works!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worked to sanitize my baby. She gets so dirty... she barely fit, but I stuffed her in there alright. Smelled way better afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CPS-100 Baby Portable UV Sterilizer
product_meta.description: Designed for maximum ease and effectiveness, this battery-operated Cuisinart Baby Portable UV Sterilizer uses the power of ultraviolet light to eliminate viruses and bacteria. In six minutes, it sterilizes baby bottle nipples, and pacifi ers - with no mess or chemicals. Compact and portable for easy storage, the unit is perfect for on-the-go parents who want the comfort and convenience of being able to sterilize oral essentials for babies anytime, anywhere. Features: Strong UV light|Safely eliminates 99.99% of E. coli and other viruses and bacteria in 6 minutes|Sterilizes a wide variety of oral baby supplies from bottle nipples to pacifiers|The clips to hold pacifiers are removable and can be reinserted allowing to fit larger sized pacifiers to be sterilized|Portable compact design for easy use while travelling|Conveniently sterilizes one item at a time|BPA free|Blue LED indicator light|Runs on three AAA batteries (not included)|Limited 18-month warranty|FDA-registered device
feature_bullets: Safely eliminates 99.99% of E. coli and other viruses and bacteria in 6 minutes; Strong UV light
Sterilizes a wide variety of oral baby supplies,from bottle nipples to pacifiers
The clips to hold pacifiers are removable and can be reinserted, allowing to fit larger sized pacifiers to be sterilized
Portable compact design for easy use while travelling; Conveniently sterilizes one item at a time
BPA free; Blue LED indicator light; Runs on three AAA batteries (not included); Limited 18-month warranty; FDA-registered device

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars273 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
